Course.Name: Intro Game Develop
Course.Description: This is a project based course in which programmers and designers collaborate to create a video game. The course investigates theory and practice of developing computer games from a variety of perspectives.

Prerequisite.item: CSCI-3326 or CMPE 3326 or CSCI-3327 or CMPE 3327 or CSCI-3328 or CMPE-3328 or consent of instructor
